\w An|strong="H3068"\w* \w oracle|strong="H4853"\w*. \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w message|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w*

d* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w stretches|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w lays|strong="H3245"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w foundation|strong="H3245"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w forms|strong="H3335"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* human \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* people \w says|strong="H5002"\w*:

\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*! \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cup|strong="H5592"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* drunkenness \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*. \w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w siege|strong="H4692"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5971"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w lift|strong="H6006"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w up|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w surely|strong="H1961"\w* hurt \w themselves|strong="H7760"\w*! \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w gathered|strong="H1471"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* panic \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w rider|strong="H7392"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w madness|strong="H7697"\w*. \w But|strong="H5221"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w watch|strong="H5869"\w*, \w though|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* belonging \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w blindness|strong="H5788"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* chieftains \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* themselves, “\w The|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* chieftains \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pan|strong="H3595"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* fire \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* woods, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w torch|strong="H3940"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w sheaves|strong="H5995"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* devour \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w surrounding|strong="H5439"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*. \w But|strong="H1931"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5971"\w* \w site|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* give \w victory|strong="H3467"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w exalted|strong="H1431"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w protect|strong="H1598"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* feeblest \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* pity \w and|strong="H1004"\w* compassion. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w look|strong="H5027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* whom \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3389"\w* \w pierced|strong="H1856"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w one|strong="H3173"\w* \w laments|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H3427"\w* \w only|strong="H3173"\w* \w son|strong="H3173"\w*. \w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H4843"\w* grieve \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3389"\w* \w one|strong="H3173"\w* grieves \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w* \w will|strong="H3389"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w mourning|strong="H4553"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* Hadad-rimmon \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w plain|strong="H1237"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w land|strong="H4940"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w mourn|strong="H5594"\w*, each \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* itself: \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H1732"\w* wives \w by|strong="H4940"\w* themselves, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H1732"\w* wives \w by|strong="H4940"\w* themselves,

\w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* their wives \w by|strong="H4940"\w* themselves, \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w Shimeites|strong="H8097"\w* \w by|strong="H4940"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* their wives \w by|strong="H4940"\w* themselves,

\w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* are \w left|strong="H7604"\w*, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* itself, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* wives \w by|strong="H3605"\w* themselves.
